unnormalised: Campus hiring is crucial for fresh talent. Our experience with IIT Delhi and IIM Ahmedabad has been positive. Securing diverse perspectives from across India is key. Placement drives often start around 10/10/2024. Need better tracking from application (01/09/2024) to offer (30/11/2024). We must analyze the cost per hire, like Rs. 50,000, against retention rates. A 14:00 hrs follow-up meeting is scheduled for next week.
normalised: Campus hiring is crucial for fresh talent. Our experience with I I T Delhi and I I M Ahmedabad has been positive. Securing diverse perspectives from across India is key. Placement drives often start around tenth October two thousand and twenty four. Need better tracking from application first September two thousand and twenty four to offer thirtieth November two thousand and twenty four. We must analyze the cost per hire, like rupee fifty thousand, against retention rates. A two P.M. follow-up meeting is scheduled for next week.
